data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Strategic Availability Hiding ("Look Busy"). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

requestBody.title: Configure default hours and availability mode API Trace

data.title: Owner creates primary location Snapshot
